page.description: Chart parameters for embedded chart definition

property.name: ChartProvider
property.description: Type "C". Provider for charting data (i.e. Native or google)

property.name: ChartType
property.description: Type "C". Kind of chart (i.e. Pie, Line etc)

property.name: Chart3d
property.description: Type "L". Use 3-d rendition of chart.

property.name: ChartEffect
property.description: Type "C". Optional, chart type specific effects.

property.name: sourceType
property.description: Type "C". Data source for the chart (table, SQL, containing report, custom etc)

property.name: sourceTable
property.description: Type "C". For table sources, the name of the source table.

property.name: sourceConnection
property.description: Type "C". For SQL source, the SQL connection.

property.name: sourceSQLSelect
property.description: Type "C". For SQL source, the SQL select statement.

property.name: sourceSQLPortable
property.description: Type "L". For SQL source, true if the select statement is portable SQL .

property.name: sourceArguments
property.description: Type "C". For SQL and table source, the arguments to provide.

property.name: sourceArgumentBindings
property.description: Type "C". For SQL and table source, the how the arguments are bound.

property.name: customExpression
property.description: Type "C". For custom source, the expression to evaluate that returns the chart data.

property.name: filterExpression
property.description: Type "C". For source table, the filter to use for the data.

property.name: DataExpression
property.description: Type "C". For SQL, table and report - source column or DBASE expression (from source data).

property.name: Data2Expression
property.description: Type "C". For SQL, table and report - optional second data dimension.

property.name: Data3Expression
property.description: Type "C". For SQL, table and report - optional third data dimension.

property.name: Data4Expression
property.description: Type "C". For SQL, table and report - optional forth data dimension.

property.name: Data5Expression
property.description: Type "C". For SQL, table and report - optional fifth data dimension.y

property.name: Data6Expression
property.description: Type "C". For SQL, table and report - optional sixth data dimension.

property.name: XAxisDataType
property.description: Type "C". The type of scalar data on the X axis (i.e. numeric, date, time)

property.name: YAxisDataType
property.description: Type "C". The type of scalar data on the Y axis (i.e. numeric, date, time)

property.name: DataSeriesColumns
property.description: Type "C". For series source charts, a cr-lf delimited list of columns to use

property.name: DataLabelExpression
property.description: Type "C". Dbase expression to use for data lables.

property.name: DataLabelPlacement
property.description: Type "C". Where to place the data labels.

property.name: CategoryExpression
property.description: Type "C". Expression to use on the category axis (to group data from different series together)

property.name: CategoryLabelExpression
property.description: Type "C". Expression to use to create category axis labels.

property.name: titleExpression
property.description: Type "C". Expression to generate the charts title.

property.name: xAxisTitleExpression
property.description: Type "C". Expression to generate the X Axis title.

property.name: yAxisTitleExpression
property.description: Type "C". Expression to generate the Y Axis title.

property.name: showSecondaryAxis
property.description: Type "L". Show another axis on the right.

property.name: x2AxisTitleExpression
property.description: Type "C". Right hand axis title expression.

property.name: y2AxisTitleExpression
property.description: Type "C". Top axis title expression.

property.name: eachGroup
property.description: Type "C". For containing report sourced charts - the group we want to sample data at.

property.name: overGroup
property.description: Type "C". For containing report sourced charts - the group we want the chart to represent.

property.name: eachExpression
property.description: Type "C". For tabular data, to expression we want to be unique for each data point.

property.name: seriesType
property.description: Type "C". For series - get data from multiple rows, or multiple columns.

property.name: seriesGroup
property.description: Type "C". For report based multiple series charts, the group we want to create series on.

property.name: seriesExpression
property.description: Type "C". The expression we want to use for differentiating series.

property.name: seriesLabelExpression
property.description: Type "C". The expression to use to generate labels for the series.

property.name: sliceExplodeExpression
property.description: Type "C". For pie charts only - expression to control weather a pie slice is exploded in the render.

property.name: PlotSeriesOnAxis
property.description: Type "L". Plot the series points along the X axis

property.name: Summarization
property.description: Type "C". Summarization for data points

property.name: includeZero
property.description: Type "C". Include zero on the y axis.

property.name: showBreaks
property.description: Type "L". Show breaks in the data.

property.name: outputFormat
property.description: Type "C". Special formatting for generated data.

property.name: width
property.description: Type "N". Width of the chart (in pixels)

property.name: height
property.description: Type "N". Height of the chart (in pixels)

property.name: styleSheet
property.description: Type "C". Stylesheet for chart appearance (colors/ fill/ lines and fonts)

property.name: dataFormat
property.description: Type "C". Format of data display on axis.

property.name: xAxisDataFormat
property.description: Type "C". String xAxisDataFormat property

property.name: clientMarginPercent
property.description: Type "N". The amount of space (expressed as percentage of interval) to lead between chart axis lines and first data point.

property.name: minimumXInterval
property.description: Type "N". The minimum allowed X interval (i.e. setting this to 1 will prevent fractional ticks)

property.name: minimumYInterval
property.description: Type "N". The minimum allowed Y interval (i.e. setting this to 1 will prevent fractional ticks)

property.name: xInterval
property.description: Type "N". Explicitly control the interval between ticks on the x axis.

property.name: yInterval
property.description: Type "N". Explicitly control the interval between ticks on the y axis.

property.name: maximumXTicks
property.description: Type "N". control the maximum number of ticks we allow on the X axis

property.name: maximumYTicks
property.description: Type "N". control the maximum number of ticks we allow on the Y axis

property.name: uxBindings
property.description: Type "C". String uxBindings property

methodref.name: GenerateFormat
methodref.description: Generate Format given class definition, pass in pointer to 'binding' environment (i.e. report).

methodref.name: GenerateSampleURL
methodref.description: Generate sample URL given class definition, for design-time representation of graph. options 'd' - show data point labels.

methodref.name: GenerateURL
methodref.description: Generate URL given class definition, pass in pointer to 'binding' environment (i.e. report).

methodref.name: Load
methodref.description: Create a new report chart object (meta data for a chart).

methodref.name: MergeDefinition
methodref.description: Load definition, and apply changes from another definition, return merged result.

methodref.name: ReportChartExprRegister
methodref.description: Return expressions that register enum report data.

methodref.name: ReportChartGenerateURL
methodref.description: Load and run a report object in one go, returns chart URL.

methodref.name: ReportChartSampleURL
methodref.description: Load and run a report object in one go, returns sample chart URL.

methodref.name: Save
methodref.description: Create a chart object definition that can be embedded into an html report.
